=========================

Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1TDCMS_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-11 15:10
Subject: Stepping to Destress, Patrick Chalhoub At The Altagamma Monitor Event, Share Your Ideas, Al Noor Walk for Inclusion, Baccarat Alchemist Garden Exhibition, Jacquemus Dubai Address T-Shirt, Faces Store Opening & Boss Kidswear Pop Up
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/550600/849F231EFE49964908478CC50F5F7291/stepping-to-destress.png> 	

CHALHOUB 30X30: STEPPING TO DESTRESS


Stress is a challenge we all encounter, making it very important to find ways to destress. One method is stepping, which clears your mind and reduces tension. Whether you take a quick walk or just move around at your desk, a little movement can make a big difference.

WATCH PATRICK CHALHOUB SPEAK AT THE ALTAGAMMA MONITOR EVENT

Patrick Chalhoub will be speaking at the Altagamma Monitor event in Milan on Nov 13th at 3:15 pm (UAE time), in a conversation with Stefania Lazzaroni, CEO of Altagamma. They will explore the luxury sector in the region, discussing both the challenges and opportunities within this evolving market. If interested, you can watch his session or the full event starting 1:30pm (UAE time) here! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252faltagamma.it%252fosservatorio-2024%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTGlLlo4OSqVDJtXs4%252f7nBYHeO5VWRgQ6183nkuP2wHPeHqGKTqPvSreMSfzudrpyAiTm25m0KW7ymth4FjwzbdPVZO471P9Jkxt83YESaAmVGl325ys3NNqNjI7EW8uqO%252bH4bfVZgXfk%252fA8xGVlpHAaUW5EK28DkqTGCfN9GXA8fDRT4pZoYbbjSd%252ftMAm0P%252fKbYG1I8SJYzw%252b8MiqkkP9uZwc8EkMJ%252fDubGGBDDWAy&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C82170c6974254eb4976708dd02417be4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638669202472822496%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Q7sI4w4J174OlAgYRPWW%2FRVc9xdkI1y8Uw8gozTgRs0%3D&reserved=0>

SHARE YOUR IDEAS FOR BUILDING COMMUNITIES AT OUR GROUP

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/550601/74BBEE8A4966BC8DA8848F08D8CCAD38/hgimg_4928.jpg> 	
Your work community represents the largest group you will ever be a part of.

One of the Ibtikar programme initiatives focuses on helping team members in forming connections, both professionally and personally, through shared interests.

Contribute to the communities you wish to engage with and help mold the culture you aspire to create. By answering 3 quick questions, you will play a vital role in transforming this project from an idea into a reality!

JOIN THE CHALHOUB GROUP X AL NOOR WALK FOR INCLUSION 2024

Join our walk with the community along side Al Noor Center, dedicated to supporting People of Determination, in line with our Group's commitment to Diversity, Equity & inclusion.
Saturday, 23rd Nov at 8 am 
Starting Point: Al Noor Center, Barsha
Friends & family are welcome, register now! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252fefJ29QPsw8%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTGlLlo4OSqVDJtXs4%252f7nBYHeO5VWRgQ6183nkuP2wHPeHqGKTqPvSreMSfzudrpyAiTm25m0KW7ymth4FjwzbdPVZO471P9Jkxt83YESaAmVGl325ys3NNqNjI7EW8uqO%252bH4bfVZgXfk%252fA8xGVlpHAaUW5EK28DkqTGCfN9GXA8fDRT4pZoYbbjSd%252ftMAm0P%252fKbYG1I8SJYzw%252b8MiqkkP9uZwc8EkMJ%252fDubGGBDDWAy&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C82170c6974254eb4976708dd02417be4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638669202472885919%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jbPE%2Bq%2Fzawk1F2cpvcmjAbYsiU43KVTYgmtoH8jRAp0%3D&reserved=0>

Call for Nominations: Excellence!


Let’s celebrate excellence together by recognising the team members who consistently deliver exceptional results and go beyond expectations. Nominate a colleague or team who embodies excellence for this year’s Chalhoub Excellence Awards. 

Don’t miss the chance to recognise their impact!

NOMINATE NOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/545259/915E364BAA7966BD876E57771101A25A/nuggets-43.png> 	

BACCARAT ALCHEMIST GARDEN EXHIBITION

In honor of Baccarat's 260th anniversary, an exclusive exhibition will be held at Milos, Atlantis The Royal, on November 15th and 16th. This event will present the captivating Alchemist Garden experience, inviting you to explore Baccarat’s extraordinary craftsmanship and artistry up close. RSVP NOW <mailto:Tanagra.events@chalhoub.com>

JACQUEMUS LAUNCHES DUBAI ADDRESS T-SHIRT

Discover the new Dubai address T-shirt, exclusively on Jacquemus.ae <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttp%253a%252f%252fwww.Jacquemus.ae%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTGlLlo4OSqVDJtXs4%252f7nBYHeO5VWRgQ6183nkuP2wHPeHqGKTqPvSreMSfzudrpyAiTm25m0KW7ymth4FjwzbdPVZO471P9Jkxt83YESaAmVGl325ys3NNqNjI7EW8uqO%252bH4bfVZgXfk%252fA8xGVlpHAaUW5EK28DkqTGCfN9GXA8fDRT4pZoYbbjSd%252ftMAm0P%252fKbYG1I8SJYzw%252b8MiqkkP9uZwc8EkMJ%252fDubGGBDDWAy&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C82170c6974254eb4976708dd02417be4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638669202472942693%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QZmEHN7Gv%2BpLJ73mi%2FfQwvucmcmV%2F0X3o%2BmQJfqoCXk%3D&reserved=0>  and in our Dubai Mall boutique.

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/550603/091689B5F6BA6003D469C4E27E5B173F/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-44.gif>

LATEST FACES STORE OPENING IN EGYPT

Celebrating the soft opening of our newest FACES store at District 5 Mall in Egypt! 

This marks our 10th store in Egypt, representing a significant milestone in our journey to bring the ultimate beauty experience to more customers.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/550605/D9EE9C09F33D0160BF532654715EBFB0/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-45.gif>

VISIT THE BOSS SOCCER POP UP AT HARVEY NICHOLS

Kick off the fun with Boss Kidswear and visit the last soccer pop up at Harvey Nichols Dubai Mall to experience an exiting adventure.

Make sure to pass by before the end of November!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/zyGpwFy_tkWq_5lWAnNjrQ/550606/0F92DE51AE076448769D9615B3BCCED4/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-46.gif>
